Package LinAlg

Interface LUFactorization

All Known Subinterfaces:
MatrixFactorizations
All Known Implementing Classes:
Matrix, Vector
interface LUFactorization
An interface which provides functionality for QR factorizations.
Author:
Jacob Watters

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Matrix[] LU​(Matrix A)
    Factors a square matrix A into a lower triangular matrix, L, and an upper tirangular matrix, U, such that A = L*U.
    static Matrix[] LUPivot​(Matrix A)  
    static int maxIndex​(Number[] col, int colIndex)  

  • Method Details

    • LU

      static Matrix[] LU​(Matrix A)
      Factors a square matrix A into a lower triangular matrix, L, and an upper tirangular matrix, U, such that A = L*U. Note: this method does not use partial pivoting.
      Parameters:
      A - - Matrix to factor into LU
      Returns:
      Matrices L and U from LU factorization. This will be a Matrix array of length 2.

    • LUPivot

      static Matrix[] LUPivot​(Matrix A)
      Parameters:
      A -
      Returns:

    • maxIndex

      static int maxIndex​(Number[] col, int colIndex)
